title: Sri Lanka Five-Star Beachfront Haven with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails and Daily Lunch or Dinner
description:
Imagine waking up to the gentle sound of waves lapping against the shore and strolling out onto your balcony to enjoy boundless Indian Ocean views. Dive into the infinity pool that melts into the horizon, unwind with a bliss-worthy treatment on the beach at Ayurvie Spa and discover barefoot dining, whether a casual seaside snack or a gourmet feast under the stars.

Perched on Sri Lanka’s less-travelled east coast, far from the usual tourist trails, Maalu Maalu Resort & Spa is your gateway to the island’s best-kept secrets. Grab your snorkel and explore coral reefs just steps from your room, take a day trip to Polonnaruwa to marvel at ancient ruins or jump on a boat to Batticaloa Lagoon, famous for its unique singing fish.
offer_address: Coconut Development Board Road, Pasikuda 30410, Sri Lanka
